title: Test
summary: This bar chart has 10 categories on the x axis representing Earthquake, and Death toll in each Earthquake on the y axis.
The highest category is found at Tangshan (China 1976) where Death toll is 242000.0.
The lowest category is found at Muzaffarabad (Pakistan 2005) where Death toll is 73338.0.
The highest value at Tangshan (China 1976) is almost 3.3 times larger than the minimum value of Muzaffarabad (Pakistan 2005).
The highest value at Tangshan (China 1976) is almost 3.3 times larger than the minimum value of Muzaffarabad (Pakistan 2005).
The difference between the max Earthquake Tangshan (China 1976) and min Earthquake Muzaffarabad (Pakistan 2005) is 168662.0.
